chapters.title: Chapter 5: Questioners
chapters.info: Temaile Kinderode, p. 115 (95)—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the Gray. A fragile woman from Cairhien with very big, blue eyes. Amico allegedly overheard her talking with Liandrin about Black Ajah business. She has a mean streak a mile wide—she actually enjoys the pain of others.
